select.if:
SELECT c.* FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(ADDRESS,'') AS ADDRESS, ISNULL(DESCR,'') AS DESCR, ISNULL(REV,'') AS REV, ISNULL(DRAWING,'') AS DRAWING, ISNULL(LOOPNAME,'') AS LOOPNAME, ISNULL(XYGUBUN,'') AS XYGUBUN, ISNULL(DEVICE,'') AS DEVICE, ISNULL(MESSAGE,'') AS MESSAGE, ISNULL(VLOW,'') AS VLOW, ISNULL(VHIGH,'') AS VHIGH, ISNULL(ELOW,'') AS ELOW, ISNULL(EHIGH,'') AS EHIGH, ISNULL(CONV,'') AS CONV,
CASE ISNULL(TYPE,'') WHEN 0 THEN 'None' WHEN 1 THEN 'High' WHEN 2 THEN 'Low' WHEN 3 THEN 'High/Low' WHEN 4 THEN 'High DTAB' WHEN 5 THEN 'Low DTAB' WHEN 6 THEN 'High/Low DTAB' WHEN 7 THEN 'High/Very High' WHEN 8 THEN 'Low/Very Low' WHEN 9 THEN 'Irrational' ELSE '' END AS TYPE,
CASE ISNULL(TYPE,'') WHEN 0 THEN 'Alarm on Opening' WHEN 1 THEN 'Alarm on Closing' ELSE '' END AS TYPE,
ISNULL(TYPE,'') AS TYPE,
CASE ISNULL(IOGROUP,'') WHEN 0 THEN 'None' WHEN 1 THEN 'Reactor and PHT' WHEN 2 THEN 'Turbine and boilers' WHEN 3 THEN 'Safety' WHEN 4 THEN 'Electrical' WHEN 8 THEN 'Auxiliaries' ELSE '' END AS IOGROUP,
CASE ISNULL(IOGROUP,'') WHEN 0 THEN 'None' WHEN 1 THEN 'Reactor and PHT' WHEN 2 THEN 'SG/Turbine' WHEN 3 THEN 'Safety' WHEN 4 THEN 'Electrical' WHEN 8 THEN 'Auxiliaries' ELSE '' END AS IOGROUP,
ISNULL(IOGROUP,'') AS IOGROUP,
CASE ISNULL(PRIORITY,'') WHEN 0 THEN 'Printer only' WHEN 1 THEN 'Minor' WHEN 2 THEN 'Safety' WHEN 3 THEN 'Major' ELSE '' END AS PRIORITY,
CASE ISNULL(PRIORITY,'') WHEN 0 THEN 'Undef' WHEN 1 THEN 'Minor' WHEN 2 THEN 'Safety' WHEN 3 THEN 'Major' ELSE '' END AS PRIORITY,
ISNULL(PRIORITY,'') AS PRIORITY,
ISNULL(EQU#,'') AS EQU, ISNULL(BSCAL,'') AS BSCAL, ISNULL(WINDOW,'') AS WINDOW, CASE ISNULL(RTRIM(LTRIM(STR(WIBA))),'') WHEN 0 THEN 'OUT' WHEN 1 THEN 'IN' ELSE '' END AS WIBA, ISNULL(UNIT,'') AS UNIT, ISNULL(LIMIT1,'') AS LIMIT2, ISNULL(LIMIT2,'') AS LIMIT1, ISNULL(PURPOSE,'') AS PURPOSE, ISNULL(PROGRAM,'') AS PROGRAM, ISNULL(RTD,'') AS RTD, ISNULL(J,'') AS J, ISNULL(ISEQ,'') AS ISEQ, ISNULL(IHOGI,'') AS IHOGI, ISNULL(IOTYPE,'') AS IOTYPE, ISNULL(ZTEXT1,'') AS ZTEXT1, ISNULL(ZTEXT2,'') AS ZTEXT2, ISNULL(ZTEXT3,'') AS ZTEXT3,
ISNULL(TR,'') AS TR,
CASE ISNULL(TR,'') WHEN 0 THEN 'Seconds' WHEN 1 THEN 'Milliseconds' ELSE '' END AS TR,
CASE ISNULL(CR,'') WHEN 0 THEN 'None' WHEN 1 THEN 'Conditioned' ELSE '' END AS CR, ISNULL(IOBIT,'') AS IOBIT, ISNULL(COM1,'') AS COM1, ISNULL(COM2,'') AS COM2, CASE ISNULL(N,'') WHEN 0 THEN 'Commission' WHEN 1 THEN 'Not Commission' ELSE '' END AS N, ISNULL(CONDITION,'') AS CONDITION, ISNULL(CTRLNAME,'') AS CTRLNAME, ISNULL(INTERLOCK,'') AS INTERLOCK, ISNULL(FEEDBACK,'') AS FEEDBACK, ISNULL(ALARMCOND,'') AS ALARMCOND, ISNULL(INDICATE,'') AS INDICATE FROM MST_TAG_DCC WITH (NOLOCK)
AND iHogi = #{iHogi}
AND iHogi = 3
AND xyGubun = #{xyGubun}
AND xyGubun = 'X'
AND ioType = #{ioType}
AND ioBit = #{ioBit}
AND address in ( ${address} )
AND address between #{address} AND #{address2}
AND address = #{address}
AND ${searchKey_1} LIKE '%${searchWord_1}%'
AND ${searchKey_2} LIKE '%${searchWord_2}%'
AND ${searchKey_3} LIKE '%${searchWord_3}%'
) c ORDER BY CONVERT(INT,ADDRESS)

mapper.select:
SELECT COLUMN_NAME AS columnName FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME='MST_TAG_DCC'
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('REV','DESCR','MESSAGE','DRAWING','LOOPNAME','PURPOSE','PROGRAM','VLOW', 'VHIGH','ELOW','EHIGH','UNIT','CONV','RTD','TYPE','IOGROUP','WINDOW', 'PRIORITY','CR','LIMIT1','LIMIT2','J','N','EQU#','BSCAL','WIBA','DEVICE')
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('REV','DESCR','DRAWING','DEVICE','PURPOSE','CTRLNAME','INTERLOCK','FEEDBACK','WIBA')
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('CR','MESSAGE','DRAWING','REV','DEVICE','CONDITION','WIBA','IOGROUP','TR','PRIORITY','TYPE')
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('IOBIT','REV','DESCR','DRAWING','DEVICE','PURPOSE','CTRLNAME','ALARMCOND','INDICATE','WIBA')
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('IOBIT','REV','DESCR','DRAWING','DEVICE','PURPOSE','CTRLNAME','INTERLOCK','WIBA')
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('PROGRAM','DESCR','LOOPNAME')

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT
FROM MST_TAG_DCC a, MST_TAG_DCC b
FROM MST_TAG_DCC
AND a.IOTYPE = #{iotype} AND b.IOTYPE = REPLACE(#{iotype},'FT','') AND b.IHOGI = a.IHOGI AND b.XYGUBUN = a.XYGUBUN AND b.ADDRESS = a.ADDRESS
AND a.IHOGI = #{ihogi}
AND a.XYGUBUN = #{xygubun}
AND CONVERT(INT,a.ADDRESS) ${address}
AND b.DESCR LIKE '%' + #{descr} + '%'
AND b.MESSAGE LIKE '%' + #{message} + '%'
AND b.REV LIKE '%' + #{rev} + '%'
AND b.DRAWING LIKE '%' + #{drawing} + '%'
AND b.LOOPNAME LIKE '%' + #{loopname} + '%'
AND b.DEVICE LIKE '%' + #{device} + '%'
AND b.PURPOSE LIKE '%' + #{purpose} + '%'
AND b.PROGRAM LIKE '%' + #{program} + '%'
AND b.VLOW LIKE '%' + #{vlow} + '%'
AND b.VHIGH LIKE '%' + #{vhigh} + '%'
AND b.ELOW LIKE '%' + #{elow} + '%'
AND b.EHIGH LIKE '%' + #{ehigh} + '%'
AND b.UNIT LIKE '%' + #{unit} + '%'
AND b.CONV LIKE '%' + #{conv} + '%'
AND b.RTD LIKE '%' + #{rtd} + '%'
AND b.TYPE LIKE '%' + #{type} + '%'
AND b.IOGROUP LIKE '%' + #{iogroup} + '%'
AND b.WINDOW LIKE '%' + #{window} + '%'
AND b.PRIORITY LIKE '%' + #{priority} + '%'
AND b.CR LIKE '%' + #{cr} + '%'
AND b.LIMIT1 LIKE '%' + #{limit1} + '%'
AND b.LIMIT2 LIKE '%' + #{limit2} + '%'
AND b.J LIKE '%' + #{j} + '%'
AND b.N LIKE '%' + #{n} + '%'
AND b.EQU# LIKE '%' + #{equ} + '%'
AND b.BSCAL LIKE '%' + #{bscal} + '%'
AND b.WIBA LIKE '%' + #{wiba} + '%'
AND b.WB# LIKE '%' + #{wb} + '%'
AND b.CTRLNAME LIKE '%' + #{ctrlname} + '%'
AND b.INTERLOCK LIKE '%' + #{interlock} + '%'
AND b.FEEDBACK LIKE '%' + #{feedback} + '%'
AND b.COM1 LIKE '%' + #{com1} + '%'
AND b.COM2 LIKE '%' + #{com2} + '%'
AND b.CONDITION LIKE '%' + #{condition} + '%'
AND b.TR LIKE '%' + #{tr} + '%'
AND b.IOBIT LIKE '%' + #{iobit} + '%'
AND b.ALARMCOND LIKE '%' + #{alarmcond} + '%'
AND b.INDICATE LIKE '%' + #{indicate} + '%'
AND IOTYPE = #{iotype}
AND IHOGI = #{ihogi}
AND XYGUBUN = #{xygubun}
AND CONVERT(INT,ADDRESS) ${address}
AND DESCR LIKE '%' + #{descr} + '%'
AND MESSAGE LIKE '%' + #{message} + '%'
AND REV LIKE '%' + #{rev} + '%'
AND DRAWING LIKE '%' + #{drawing} + '%'
AND LOOPNAME LIKE '%' + #{loopname} + '%'
AND DEVICE LIKE '%' + #{device} + '%'
AND PURPOSE LIKE '%' + #{purpose} + '%'
AND PROGRAM LIKE '%' + #{program} + '%'
AND VLOW LIKE '%' + #{vlow} + '%'
AND VHIGH LIKE '%' + #{vhigh} + '%'
AND ELOW LIKE '%' + #{elow} + '%'
AND EHIGH LIKE '%' + #{ehigh} + '%'
AND UNIT LIKE '%' + #{unit} + '%'
AND CONV LIKE '%' + #{conv} + '%'
AND RTD LIKE '%' + #{rtd} + '%'
AND TYPE LIKE '%' + #{type} + '%'
AND IOGROUP LIKE '%' + #{iogroup} + '%'
AND WINDOW LIKE '%' + #{window} + '%'
AND PRIORITY LIKE '%' + #{priority} + '%'
AND CR LIKE '%' + #{cr} + '%'
AND LIMIT1 LIKE '%' + #{limit1} + '%'
AND LIMIT2 LIKE '%' + #{limit2} + '%'
AND J LIKE '%' + #{j} + '%'
AND N LIKE '%' + #{n} + '%'
AND EQU# LIKE '%' + #{equ} + '%'
AND BSCAL LIKE '%' + #{bscal} + '%'
AND WIBA LIKE '%' + #{wiba} + '%'
AND WB# LIKE '%' + #{wb} + '%'
AND CTRLNAME LIKE '%' + #{ctrlname} + '%'
AND INTERLOCK LIKE '%' + #{interlock} + '%'
AND FEEDBACK LIKE '%' + #{feedback} + '%'
AND COM1 LIKE '%' + #{com1} + '%'
AND COM2 LIKE '%' + #{com2} + '%'
AND CONDITION LIKE '%' + #{condition} + '%'
AND TR LIKE '%' + #{tr} + '%'
AND IOBIT LIKE '%' + #{iobit} + '%'
AND ALARMCOND LIKE '%' + #{alarmcond} + '%'
AND INDICATE LIKE '%' + #{indicate} + '%'

SELECT
IHOGI , ISEQ , IOTYPE , ADDRESS , IOBIT , XYGUBUN , LOOPNAME , TBLNO , FLDNO , FILEPOSITION , FASTIOCHK , FEEDBACK , REV , DESCR , PURPOSE , VLOW , VHIGH , ELOW , EHIGH , UNIT , CONV , RTD , REQUEST , TYPE , IOGROUP , WINDOW , PRIORITY , TR , CR , LIMIT1 , LIMIT2 , J , N , MESSAGE , EQU# , BSCAL , CAST(WIBA AS int) AS WIBA , WB# , AA# , IOINDEX , PROGRAM , REVISION , DEVICE , CTRLNAME , INTERLOCK , ALARMCOND , INDICATE , COM1 , COM2 , DRAWING , CONDITION , IODATE , MEASURENO , OPERATIONVAR , DRAWINGPOS , RIGHTVAL , NORMALVAL , REQNO , REQNAME , REQDATE , REQDEPT , REQBIGO , ZTEXT1 , ZTEXT2 , ZTEXT3 FROM MST_TAG_DCC
b.IHOGI , b.ISEQ , b.IOTYPE , a.ADDRESS , b.IOBIT , b.XYGUBUN , b.LOOPNAME , b.TBLNO , a.FLDNO , b.FILEPOSITION , b.FASTIOCHK , b.FEEDBACK , b.REV , b.DESCR , b.PURPOSE , b.VLOW , b.VHIGH , b.ELOW , b.EHIGH , b.UNIT , b.CONV , b.RTD , b.REQUEST , b.TYPE , b.IOGROUP , b.WINDOW , b.PRIORITY , b.TR , b.CR , b.LIMIT1 , b.LIMIT2 , b.J , b.N , b.MESSAGE , b.EQU# , b.BSCAL , CAST(b.WIBA AS int) AS WIBA , b.WB# , b.AA# , b.IOINDEX , b.PROGRAM , b.REVISION , b.DEVICE , b.CTRLNAME , b.INTERLOCK , b.ALARMCOND , b.INDICATE , b.COM1 , b.COM2 , b.DRAWING , b.CONDITION , b.IODATE , b.MEASURENO , b.OPERATIONVAR , b.DRAWINGPOS , b.RIGHTVAL , b.NORMALVAL , b.REQNO , b.REQNAME , b.REQDATE , b.REQDEPT , b.REQBIGO , b.ZTEXT1 , b.ZTEXT2 , b.ZTEXT3 FROM MST_TAG_DCC a, MST_TAG_DCC b
AND a.IOTYPE = #{iotype} AND b.IOTYPE = REPLACE(#{iotype},'FT','') AND b.IHOGI = a.IHOGI AND b.XYGUBUN = a.XYGUBUN AND b.ADDRESS = a.ADDRESS
AND a.IHOGI = #{ihogi}
AND a.XYGUBUN = #{xygubun}
AND CONVERT(INT,a.ADDRESS) ${address}
AND b.DESCR LIKE '%' + #{descr} + '%'
AND b.MESSAGE LIKE '%' + #{message} + '%'
AND b.REV LIKE '%' + #{rev} + '%'
AND b.DRAWING LIKE '%' + #{drawing} + '%'
AND b.LOOPNAME LIKE '%' + #{loopname} + '%'
AND b.DEVICE LIKE '%' + #{device} + '%'
AND b.PURPOSE LIKE '%' + #{purpose} + '%'
AND b.PROGRAM LIKE '%' + #{program} + '%'
AND b.VLOW LIKE '%' + #{vlow} + '%'
AND b.VHIGH LIKE '%' + #{vhigh} + '%'
AND b.ELOW LIKE '%' + #{elow} + '%'
AND b.EHIGH LIKE '%' + #{ehigh} + '%'
AND b.UNIT LIKE '%' + #{unit} + '%'
AND b.CONV LIKE '%' + #{conv} + '%'
AND b.RTD LIKE '%' + #{rtd} + '%'
AND b.TYPE LIKE '%' + #{type} + '%'
AND b.IOGROUP LIKE '%' + #{iogroup} + '%'
AND b.WINDOW LIKE '%' + #{window} + '%'
AND b.PRIORITY LIKE '%' + #{priority} + '%'
AND b.CR LIKE '%' + #{cr} + '%'
AND b.LIMIT1 LIKE '%' + #{limit1} + '%'
AND b.LIMIT2 LIKE '%' + #{limit2} + '%'
AND b.J LIKE '%' + #{j} + '%'
AND b.N LIKE '%' + #{n} + '%'
AND b.EQU# LIKE '%' + #{equ} + '%'
AND b.BSCAL LIKE '%' + #{bscal} + '%'
AND b.WIBA LIKE '%' + #{wiba} + '%'
AND b.WB# LIKE '%' + #{wb} + '%'
AND b.CTRLNAME LIKE '%' + #{ctrlname} + '%'
AND b.INTERLOCK LIKE '%' + #{interlock} + '%'
AND b.FEEDBACK LIKE '%' + #{feedback} + '%'
AND b.COM1 LIKE '%' + #{com1} + '%'
AND b.COM2 LIKE '%' + #{com2} + '%'
AND b.CONDITION LIKE '%' + #{condition} + '%'
AND b.TR LIKE '%' + #{tr} + '%'
AND b.IOBIT LIKE '%' + #{iobit} + '%'
AND b.ALARMCOND LIKE '%' + #{alarmcond} + '%'
AND b.INDICATE LIKE '%' + #{indicate} + '%'
AND IOTYPE = #{iotype}
AND IHOGI = #{ihogi}
AND XYGUBUN = #{xygubun}
AND CONVERT(INT,ADDRESS) ${address}
AND DESCR LIKE '%' + #{descr} + '%'
AND MESSAGE LIKE '%' + #{message} + '%'
AND REV LIKE '%' + #{rev} + '%'
AND DRAWING LIKE '%' + #{drawing} + '%'
AND LOOPNAME LIKE '%' + #{loopname} + '%'
AND DEVICE LIKE '%' + #{device} + '%'
AND PURPOSE LIKE '%' + #{purpose} + '%'
AND PROGRAM LIKE '%' + #{program} + '%'
AND VLOW LIKE '%' + #{vlow} + '%'
AND VHIGH LIKE '%' + #{vhigh} + '%'
AND ELOW LIKE '%' + #{elow} + '%'
AND EHIGH LIKE '%' + #{ehigh} + '%'
AND UNIT LIKE '%' + #{unit} + '%'
AND CONV LIKE '%' + #{conv} + '%'
AND RTD LIKE '%' + #{rtd} + '%'
AND TYPE LIKE '%' + #{type} + '%'
AND IOGROUP LIKE '%' + #{iogroup} + '%'
AND WINDOW LIKE '%' + #{window} + '%'
AND PRIORITY LIKE '%' + #{priority} + '%'
AND CR LIKE '%' + #{cr} + '%'
AND LIMIT1 LIKE '%' + #{limit1} + '%'
AND LIMIT2 LIKE '%' + #{limit2} + '%'
AND J LIKE '%' + #{j} + '%'
AND N LIKE '%' + #{n} + '%'
AND EQU# LIKE '%' + #{equ} + '%'
AND BSCAL LIKE '%' + #{bscal} + '%'
AND WIBA LIKE '%' + #{wiba} + '%'
AND WB# LIKE '%' + #{wb} + '%'
AND CTRLNAME LIKE '%' + #{ctrlname} + '%'
AND INTERLOCK LIKE '%' + #{interlock} + '%'
AND FEEDBACK LIKE '%' + #{feedback} + '%'
AND COM1 LIKE '%' + #{com1} + '%'
AND COM2 LIKE '%' + #{com2} + '%'
AND CONDITION LIKE '%' + #{condition} + '%'
AND TR LIKE '%' + #{tr} + '%'
AND IOBIT LIKE '%' + #{iobit} + '%'
AND ALARMCOND LIKE '%' + #{alarmcond} + '%'
AND INDICATE LIKE '%' + #{indicate} + '%'
ORDER BY CONVERT(INT, b.ADDRESS)
ORDER BY CONVERT(INT, ADDRESS)
